meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This order may be cited as the Frontier Closed Area Order.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Area declared to be closed area
section.content: The area specified in the Schedule is declared to be a closed area.

schedule.name: sch0

section.name: s1
section.content: The area enclosed by joining the positions from Point 1 to Point 85 and from Point 85 back to Point 1.

def.name: Point
def.leadIn: Point (點) means a point that has—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a point number set out in column 1 of the following Table; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: Northing and Easting coordinates set out respectively in columns 2 and 3 of the following Table opposite the point number.

section.name: s3
section.content: The coordinates are based on Hong Kong 1980 Grid System.

tr.td: From there NORTHEAST following a line of bearing 61° until it stops at the centre line of the Shenzhen River, then EAST following the centre line of the Shenzhen River and the boundary of the administrative division of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People’s Republic of China to Point 2.

tr.td: From there NORTHEAST following the mouth of Sha Tau Kok Hoi (Starling Inlet) to Point 3.

tr.td: From there SOUTH following the coast line of Sha Tau Kok Hoi (Starling Inlet) along the high water mark to Point 5, which is the western edge of the pier.

tr.td: From there NORTH following the western edge of the pier to Point 6, which is located at the junction of the pier edge and the fence.

tr.td: From there EAST across a road following the fence to Point 7, which is located at the northern end of the fence.

border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
cellpadding_top_4 cellpadding_bottom_5 valign_center cellpadding_left_5 cellpadding_right_5 border_top_0.75 border_right_0.75 border_bottom_0.75 border_left_0.75

tr.td: From there NORTHWEST following the edge of the flyover and across the nullah to Point 77.

td.class: border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
cellpadding_top_4 cellpadding_bottom_5 valign_center cellpadding_left_5 cellpadding_right_5 border_top_0.75 border_right_0.75 border_bottom_0.75 border_left_0.75

tr.td: From there NORTHWEST following the fence to Point 78.

td.class: border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
cellpadding_top_4 cellpadding_bottom_5 valign_center cellpadding_left_5 cellpadding_right_5 border_top_0.75 border_right_0.75 border_bottom_0.75 border_left_0.75

tr.td: From there SOUTHWEST following the fence to Point 79, which is located at the junction of the fences.

td.class: border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
cellpadding_top_4 cellpadding_bottom_5 valign_center cellpadding_left_5 cellpadding_right_5 border_top_0.75 border_right_0.75 border_bottom_0.75 border_left_0.75

tr.td: From there SOUTH following the fence of the Lok Ma Chau Spur Line Control Point (columns supporting the viaduct are excluded) to Point 80, which is located at the end of the fence.

td.class: border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
cellpadding_top_4 cellpadding_bottom_5 valign_center cellpadding_left_5 cellpadding_right_5 border_top_0.75 border_right_0.75 border_bottom_0.75 border_left_0.75

tr.td: From there WEST following the building edge of the Sewage Plant to Point 81, which is located at the start of the fence.

td.class: border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
cellpadding_top_4 cellpadding_bottom_5 valign_center cellpadding_left_5 cellpadding_right_5 border_top_0.75 border_right_0.75 border_bottom_0.75 border_left_0.75

tr.td: From there EAST following the fence to Point 82, which is located at the junction of the fences.

td.class: border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
cellpadding_top_4 cellpadding_bottom_5 valign_center cellpadding_left_5 cellpadding_right_5 border_top_0.75 border_right_0.75 border_bottom_0.75 border_left_0.75

tr.td: From there SOUTHWEST following the fence to Point 83, which is located at the junction of the fences.

td.class: border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
cellpadding_top_4 cellpadding_bottom_5 valign_center cellpadding_left_5 cellpadding_right_5 border_top_0.75 border_right_0.75 border_bottom_0.75 border_left_0.75

tr.td: From there SOUTHWEST following the fence to Point 84, which is located at the end of the fence.

td.class: border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
cellpadding_top_4 cellpadding_bottom_5 valign_center cellpadding_left_5 cellpadding_right_5 border_top_0.75 border_right_0.75 border_bottom_0.75 border_left_0.75

tr.td: From there WEST to Point 85.

td.class: border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
border_top_0.75 border_left_0.75 border_right_0.75 first_line_indent_0 valign_center border_bottom_0.75
cellpadding_top_4 cellpadding_bottom_5 valign_center cellpadding_left_5 cellpadding_right_5 border_top_0.75 border_right_0.75 border_bottom_0.75 border_left_0.75

tr.td: Finally NORTH returning to Point 1.

schedule.text:
Notes:
1.Point 1 and Points 69 to 85 are shown on the plan titled “PLAN 1 OF FRONTIER CLOSED AREA” annexed to this Schedule.
2.Points 19 to 68 are shown on the plan titled “PLAN 2 OF FRONTIER CLOSED AREA” annexed to this Schedule.
3.Points 2 to 18 are shown on the plan titled “PLAN 3 OF FRONTIER CLOSED AREA” annexed to this Schedule.
4.The plans annexed to this Schedule are provided for information only.

schedule.sourceNote: (Schedule replaced L.N. 170 of 2011. Amended L.N. 49 of 2013; L.N. 217 of 2015; L.N. 92 of 2023)
